verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> unto <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1095>Belteshazzar<s%>; and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H571>true<s%>, but the time <S%H6635>appointed<s%> was <S%H1419>long<s%>: and he <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%>, and had <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision<s%>.
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> was <S%H56>mourning<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%>.

I <S%H398>ate<s%> no <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, neither <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> nor <S%H3196>wine<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, neither did I <S%H5480>anoint<s%> myself at <S%H5480>all<s%>, until <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>.

And in the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, as I was by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, which is <S%H2313>Hiddekel<s%>;

Then I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, whose <S%H4975>body<s%> was <S%H2296>girded<s%> with fine <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H210>Uphaz<s%>:

His <S%H1472>body<s%> also was like <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, and his <S%H6440>face<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H1300>lightning<s%>, and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as <S%H3940>lamps<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, and his <S%H2220>arms<s%> and his <S%H4772>feet<s%> like in <S%H5869>color<s%> to <S%H7044>polished<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%>.

And I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> alone <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4759>vision<s%>: for the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with me <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4759>vision<s%>; <S%H61>but<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2731>quaking<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H1272>them<s%>, so that they fled to hide <S%H2244>themselves<s%>.

Therefore I was left <S%H7604>alone<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4759>vision<s%>, and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in <S%H1935>me<s%>: for my comeliness was <S%H2015>turned<s%> in me into <S%H4889>corruption<s%>, and I <S%H6113>retained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength<s%>.

Yet <S%H8085>heard<s%> I the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%>: and when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%>, then was I in a deep <S%H7290>sleep<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
<S%H3027>And<s%>, behold, a hand <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H5128>me<s%>, which set me upon my <S%H1290>knees<s%> and upon the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1840>me<s%>, O Daniel, a <S%H376>man<s%> greatly <S%H2532>beloved<s%>, <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H5975>you<s%>, and stand <S%H5977>upright<s%>: for unto you am I now <S%H7971>sent<s%>. And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H5975>me<s%>, I stood <S%H7460>trembling<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H3372>me<s%>, Fear <S%H1840>not<s%>, Daniel: for from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you did <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H995>understand<s%>, and to <S%H6031>chasten<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and I am <S%H935>come<s%> for your <S%H1697>words<s%>.

But the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> <S%H5975>withstood<s%> me <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: <S%H4317>but<s%>, behold, Michael, <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3498>me<s%>; and I remained there <S%H681>with<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>.

Now I am <S%H935>come<s%> to make you <S%H995>understand<s%> what shall happen <S%H7136>to<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: for yet the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is for many <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> such <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H5414>me<s%>, I set my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and I became <S%H481>mute<s%>.

<S%H1823>And<s%>, behold, one like the likeness of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%>: then I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him that <S%H5975>stood<s%> before <S%H113>me<s%>, O my lord, by the <S%H4759>vision<s%> my <S%H6735>sorrows<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> upon <S%H6113>me<s%>, and I have retained no <S%H3581>strength<s%>.

For <S%H1963>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of this my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> with this my <S%H113>lord<s%>? for as for <S%H6258>me<s%>, directly there <S%H5975>remained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in <S%H5397>me<s%>, neither is there breath left in <S%H7604>me<s%>.
Then there came <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> me one like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, and he strengthened <S%H2388>me<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H376>man<s%> greatly <S%H2532>beloved<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H7965>not<s%>: peace be unto <S%H2388>you<s%>, be strong, <S%H2388>Yes<s%>, be strong. And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H2388>me<s%>, I was strengthened, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%>; for you have strengthened <S%H2388>me<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3045>he<s%>, Know you therefore I <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H7725>you<s%>? and now will I return to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>: and when I am gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>, <S%H8269>behold<s%>, the prince of <S%H3120>Grecia<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>.

<S%H61>But<s%> I will <S%H5046>show<s%> you that which is <S%H7559>noted<s%> in the <S%H3791>scripture<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>: and there is <S%H259>none<s%> that <S%H2388>holds<s%> with me in these <S%H4317>things<s%>, but Michael your <S%H8269>prince<s%>.
